title: Impact of short-term exposure to ambient air pollutants and meteorological factors on COVID-19 incidence and mortality: A retrospective study from Dammam, Saudi Arabia
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Manal Mutieb Almutairi, Nargis Begum Javed, Soni Ali Sardar, Amal Yousef Abdelwahed, Razan Fakieh, Mohammed AL-Mohaithef
